Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter

Class AlertFilter

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter.AlertFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlertFilterAnd, AlertFilterIsLive, AlertFilterLabelName, AlertFilterLabelValue, AlertFilterOr, AlertFilterSourceLocation
public abstract class AlertFilter extends Object
A filter for alerts, generated by the front-end or through API endpoints, to select alerts

      Parameters:

    • maybeNegate

      protected <F> F maybeNegate(F filter, AlertFilterBuilder<F,String> filterBuilder)
      Convenience method to construct a filter based on negation status
      Type Parameters:
      F - the resulting filter type
      Parameters:
      filter - the default sense of the filter
      filterBuilder - the filter builder being used to generate the resulting filter
      Returns:
      the possibly negated filter

    • setNegate

      public void setNegate(boolean negate)
      Sets whether this filter should be negated
      Parameters:
